BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the identifiable assets acquired in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Other Noncurrent Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Goodwill and Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Accrued Liabilities
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from accrued liabilities.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesUnrealizedGainsOnT.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Unrealized Gains on Trading Securities
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesUnrealizedGainsOnT.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from unrealized gains on trading securities.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillOtherIncreaseDecrease.label: Goodwill, Other Increase (Decrease)
GoodwillOtherIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease), classified as other, of an asset representing the future economic benefits from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Gross (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill.description: Amount before accumulated amortization of intangible assets, excluding goodwill.

NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Notes Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the holder a definite sum of money at a future date.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.label: Payments for Repurchase of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock during the period.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseEarlyContr.label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Early Contract Termination Fees
LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseEarlyContr.description: The amount of early contract termination fees included in liabilities subject to compromise.

RestructuringCharges.label: Restructuring Charges
RestructuringCharges.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common and preferred stock.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.
